definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: I dried myself with a handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 我自己拿手巾擦干了脸。

sentences.english: That wiped away tears for you, is the last person you spend.
sentences.chinese: 那个为你擦干眼泪的，才是最后和你相守的人。

sentences.english: She picks up a dishtowel and begins drying the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起洗碟布并开始把盘子擦干。

sentences.english: Wipe away tears, we have nothing to do but adamancy.
sentences.chinese: 擦干眼泪，除了坚强我们别无选择。

sentences.english: I need some paper to dry the coffee spill.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一些纸把溅洒出来的咖啡溃擦干。

sentences.english: Before applying Mepiform make sure the scar area and surrounding skin are clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用前瘢痕和周围的皮肤要洗净擦干。

sentences.english: You won't mind using them to dry off or tossing them onto the floor for cleanups .
sentences.chinese: 你不会介意把它们用作擦干东西或清洗地板。

sentences.english: The road zigzagged into the distance, wiping the tears, you continued your journey.
sentences.chinese: 道路蜿蜒通向远方，擦干泪水，你继续你的旅程。

sentences.english: If Mr. Pliner's shoes do get wet, he immediately tries to dry them with paper towels.
sentences.chinese: 如果靴子弄湿了，普利钠会马上用纸巾把靴子擦干。

sentences.english: You'd better rub him down with a dry towel.Otherwise he'll catch cold.
sentences.chinese: 你最好用干毛巾给他擦干，否则他会感冒的。

sentences.english: After pain leads wipe stem tears, still talk smiling breeze livings at the classmates in front.
sentences.chinese: 痛过之后，擦干眼泪，在同学们面前依旧谈笑风生。

sentences.english: Then dry off and apply the antiperspirant of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 然后擦干和运用您所选择的止汗。

sentences.english: Just spray directly on clean skin after a shower.
sentences.chinese: 入浴擦干背部后，只需轻轻喷在洁净的肌肤即可。

sentences.english: She stood up with a sigh, washed the cups and put them on a cloth to dry.
sentences.chinese: 她叹了口气，站了起来，洗了杯子，并用布擦干。

sentences.english: She got out of the bath and towelled herself dry.
sentences.chinese: 她从浴盆出来并用毛巾把身上擦干。

definition: to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
to apply (ointment, powder)/to smear/to paint on
